minister.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a politician who is in charge of a government department, in Britain and some other countries

minister.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a priest in some Christian churches
minister.translation[0].definitions[2].d: someone whose job is to represent their country in another country, but who is lower in rank than an ambassador
